desc.name: desc

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is obtained when creating a character. It only lasts for 3 days, so idle wisely.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by killing a unique number of bosses.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by becoming a unique number of classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by becoming a new class.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by entering a lot of battles.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by performing a lot of critical hits.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by doing a lot of damage.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by receiving a lot of damage.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by killing a lot of bosses.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by experiencing a lot of events.

reward.name: reward
reward.extendedInfo: This only applies once for every 5 levels of Explorative.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by exploring unique maps.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by achieving certain levels.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by exploring certain maps.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by killing unique players.

reward.name: reward
reward.basicInfo: Can now use a new personality

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by meeting the requirements for a personality.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement was earned by participating in IdleLands Alpha.

reward.name: reward
reward.extendedInfo: This only applies once for every 5 levels of Walkative.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by walking a lot.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Aegis prevents critical hits.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Crit adds a bonus to your critical chance.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Dance doubles your base dodge chance.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Defense adds a +10% boost to all of your defensive calculations.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Haste allows you to take one additional step per point of haste. You only gain xp for your first 5 steps.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Prone gives you the opportunity to stun an opponent when you physically hit them. The chance of a stun happening is 15%.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Power adds a flat +10% to maximum damage possible.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Offense adds a +10% boost for each of your offensive calculations.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Glowing adds +5% to each of your combat calculations. It's pretty crazy.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Deadeye doubles your chance to overcome the opponents dodge roll.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Silver increases your minimum damage range by +10%.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Vorpal increases your minimum and maximum damage by +50%

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Forsaken makes it so every blessItem, flipStat, or forsakeItem hits this item. In the event that there are multiple forsaken items in your inventory, one will be chosen at random.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Sacred makes it so there is no chance of this item being hit by blessItem, flipStat, or forsakeItem.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Sentimentality does nothing except take up valuable equipment score.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a physically powerful class. Their Rage is a powerful force that drastically increases their STR. Rage is accumulated by taking damage and watching allies die. Each point of rage adds to the Barbarians damage multiplier. They have an overall reduction in dex and agi to make up for their bulky nature. They also take half damage on physical attacks.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a very supportive class. They sing their songs to buff their allies. If they have no allies, they are more likely to be an offensive force.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a debuffing magical class. It uses Bitrate to stun and destroy its foes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a healing class. It has some powerful damaging spells, but mostly focuses on helping allies.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a damaging class. It can use skills to stun or attack multiple times.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class does a little bit of everything. They have an attack skill that attacks all opponents, a defensive skill, and a healing skill.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a very lucky class. It uses its luck to affect everything. It also gets a bonus to having all events happen more often.

itemScore.name: itemScore
itemScore.extendedInfo: Note, all other stats are ignored except for special stats like offense, defense, etc

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is an offensive magical class. They use their numerous fireballs to burn their opponents into submission.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This is the default class for all monsters in the game if not specified otherwise. It was added to the game for players for funsies.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is very rambunctious, and often throws bottles at foes.

itemScore.name: itemScore
itemScore.basicInfo: con*2 + agi*1.5 + dex*1.5 - int - wis - luck*0.2

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class performs many deadly combos on its foes. Beware the finishing blow.

itemScore.name: itemScore
itemScore.basicInfo: con*2 + agi*1.5 + dex*1.5 - int - wis - luck*0.2

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class makes lunch for its allies and foes alike. It is a true savior, but watch out for the poison.

effect.name: effect
effect.basicInfo: +10% XP loss at end of combat

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality attempts to prevent you from fleeing from combat.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you target the weakest enemy when possible.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you Chaotic-aligned.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never want to leave parties.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you use skills far less.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality allows you to occasionally revive immediately after dying.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered DPS.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to target DPS-type classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes.

effect.name: effect
effect.basicInfo: Less likely to get into battles

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you less likely to get into combat.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you move more erratically, and act generally silly.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you Evil-aligned.

effect.name: effect
effect.extendedInfo: Only applies to explorer actions - move, up stairs, down stairs, etc

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality affords you better explorer traits to navigate the world, at the cost of stats.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to use skills. For some classes, this means they will always use skills until they run out of casting capability.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you Good-aligned.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you both gain and lose more gold, at the cost of XP.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you move faster around the world, at the cost of combat statistics.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to leave parties.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you Lawful-aligned.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you charge into battle, like a famous WoW veteran.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Magical.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Medic.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to target Medic-type classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality does nothing.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you very likely to flee combat.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Physical.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you scared of the dark. Scaredy cat.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you both gain and lose more XP, at the cost of gold.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you never change items. You become more susceptible to switcheroos, though.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Support.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to target Support-type classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you attempt to flee combat at lower hp values.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Tank.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to target Tank-type classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you are less likely to use teleports.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you find more, powerful items.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you are more likely to get into monster battles.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you are less likely to go up stairs, and slightly less likely to go down stairs.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill does very little damage, but leaves every combat effect available on the target. Currently, it will only prone the target. Poison and other effects may happen later.

desc.name: desc

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill attempts to give a resume to a target, assuming the caster has <=25% HP. Resumes can be accepted or rejected. The outcome can mean gaining or losing gold.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill feeds an ally. As for what that means, that depends on the sandwich made.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill burns up to 2 opponents. It also feeds them a sandwich, but it's most likely burnt to a crisp.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Earth day increases all elemental stats.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Evil day increases all stats for all evil aligned entities - monsters and players alike. It lowers those stats for good players.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Good day increases all stats for all good aligned entities - monsters and players alike. It lowers those stats for evil players.

desc.name: desc

desc.basicInfo: The INT day increases intelligence.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The LUCK day increases luck.

desc.basicInfo: The WIS day increases wisdom.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm runs every negative event on a player. Sucks, huh?

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm runs a random event on every player. Hope you're good at roulette.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm breaks up every party in the game.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm runs every positive event on every player. See, it's not so bad, now is it?

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm forsakes your experiences.
